text: Williams Martínez (18 December 1982 – 17 July 2021) was a Uruguayan professional footballer who played as a defender. He made his Uruguayan debut in the 2003 Lunar New Year Cup. Martínez died on July 17, 2021 of suicide, aged 38. At the time of his death, he was playing for Villa Teresa. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Footballers from Montevideo Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Williams Martínez
